functions.tag: {CustomModelData:36,display:{Name:'{"text":"Health Tonic","color":"light_purple","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"This potion grants the drinker","italic":false}','{"text":"additional vitality, but makes it","italic":false}','{"text":"much harder to hide from the foe.","italic":false}']},custom_potion_effects:[{id:"minecraft:regeneration",amplifier:0b,duration:100},{id:"minecraft:health_boost",amplifier:0b,duration:2400},{id:"minecraft:glowing",amplifier:0b,duration:2400}],CustomPotionColor:14680204}
